generated.css: *,:after,:before{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:inherit}html{font-size:62.5%}@media only screen and (max-width:75em){html{font-size:56.25%}}@media only screen and (max-width:56.25em){html{font-size:50%}}@media only screen and (min-width:112.5em){html{font-size:75%}}body{box-sizing:border-box;padding:3rem;font-family:Luckiest Guy,cursive;line-height:1.7;color:#000;letter-spacing:1px;background-color:#fff}@media only screen and (max-width:56.25em){body{padding:0}}::selection{background-color:#55c57a;color:#fff}.container{max-width:1200px;margin:0 auto}@media only screen and (max-width:37.5em){.container{padding-top:2rem}}.board{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr;grid-gap:2rem;padding:2rem;background-color:#fff}@media only screen and (max-width:37.5em){.board{grid-gap:1rem;padding:.5rem}}.btn,.btn:link,.btn:visited{text-transform:uppercase;text-decoration:none;padding:1.5rem 4rem;display:inline-block;border-radius:10rem;transition:all .1s;position:relative;font-family:Luckiest Guy,cursive;font-size:2rem;border:none;cursor:pointed}.btn:hover{transform:translateY(-.3rem);box-shadow:0 1rem 2rem rgba(0,0,0,.2);cursor:pointer}.btn:hover:after{transform:scaleX(1.4) scaleY(1.6);opacity:0}.btn:active,.btn:focus{outline:none;transform:translateY(-.1rem);box-shadow:0 .5rem 1rem rgba(0,0,0,.2)}.btn--white{color:#777}.btn--white,.btn--white:after{background-color:#fff}.btn--primary{background-color:#28b485;color:#fff}.btn--animated{animation:fadeInBottom .8s ease-out .7s;animation-fill-mode:backwards}.btn-text:link,.btn-text:visited{font-size:1.6rem;color:#55c57a;display:inline-block;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:1px solid #55c57a;padding:3px;transition:all .2s}.btn-text:hover{transform:translateY(-3px);background-color:#7ed56f;color:#fff;box-shadow:0 1rem 1rem rgba(0,0,0,.2)}.btn-text:active{transform:translateY(0);box-shadow:0 .5rem .5rem rgba(0,0,0,.2)}.panel{perspective:50rem;-moz-perspective:50rem;position:relative;height:15rem}@media only screen and (max-width:37.5em){.panel{height:10rem}}.panel__side{height:15rem;border:1rem solid #fff;border-radius:1rem;box-shadow:0 1.5rem 4rem rgba(0,0,0,.15);position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;backface-visibility:hidden;transition:all .3s ease}.panel__side--front{background-color:#28b485}.panel__side--back{background-color:#f7f7f7;transform:rotateY(180deg)}@media only screen and (max-width:37.5em){.panel__side{height:10rem}}.panel__emoji{position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);font-size:8rem}@media only screen and (max-width:37.5em){.panel__emoji{font-size:5rem}}.message{position:fixed;top:0;left:0;width:100vw;height:100vh;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.8);z-index:9999;opacity:0;visibility:hidden}.message--active{opacity:1;visibility:visible}.message__content{position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);width:50%;padding:2rem;background-color:#f7f7f7;border:4px solid #7ed56f;box-shadow:0 1.5rem 4rem rgba(0,0,0,.15);border-radius:.6rem}@media only screen and (max-width:37.5em){.message__content{width:90%;padding:1rem}}.message__header{font-size:3rem;margin-bottom:2rem;text-align:center}.message__header--win{color:#7ed56f;font-size:4rem}.message__header--lose{color:#ff7730;font-size:4rem}.message__selection{text-align:center;margin-bottom:3rem}.scoreboard{font-size:3rem;margin-bottom:2rem;text-align:center;line-height:1}@media only screen and (max-width:37.5em){.scoreboard{font-size:2rem}}.scoreboard__rounds{font-size:4rem;color:#ffb900;-webkit-text-stroke-width:2px;-webkit-text-stroke-color:#ff7730;opacity:1;transition:all .4s ease-in}@media only screen and (max-width:37.5em){.scoreboard__rounds{font-size:3rem}}
